scripts.install: dotnet restore && cd angular && npm i
scripts.reverse: dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold 'data source=DESKTOP-3550K4L\HARMONY;database=rfid;user id=sa; password=123' Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer -o Model -c 'MyContext'
scripts.m0: node ./remove-script.js && dotnet ef migrations add third --context MyContext --output-dir Migrations/project && dotnet ef database drop -f --context MyContext && dotnet ef database update --context MyContext
scripts.m: dotnet ef migrations add first --output-dir Migrations && dotnet ef database update && dotnet watch run
scripts.f-p0: cd angular && ng build --prod --output-path ../wwwroot/a --base-href=/a/ && cd .. && node ./copy.script.js
scripts.init: git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/elabdellah/api_gam_ecommerce.git && git checkout -b dev
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m "docker file edit" && git push -u origin dev
scripts.git: npm run f-git-cm && npm run b-git-cm
scripts.ci: npm run f-p && npm run push
